    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical reaction between magnesium and water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Reaktion zwischen Magnesium und Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction chimique entre le magnésium et l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação química entre o magnésio e a água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione chimica fra magnesio ed acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική αντίδραση μεταξύ του μαγνήσιου και του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción química entre el magnesio y el agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations that show magnesium reacting with steam. This illustration shows the experimental set-up. The other illustration shows the word equation for the reaction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">displacement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die das Magnesium 
zeigen, das mit Dampf reagiert. Diese Abbildung zeigt die 
experimentelle Installation. Die andere Abbildung zeigt die 
Wortgleichung für die Reaktion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations qui montrent le 
magnésium réagissant avec la vapeur. Cette illustration montre
l'installation expérimentale. L'autre illustration montre 
l'équation de mot pour la réaction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram o
magnésio que reage com o vapor. Esta ilustração mostra a 
instalação experimental. A outra ilustração mostra a 
equação da palavra para a reação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano 
il magnesio che reagisce con il vapore. Questa illustrazione 
mostra la messa a punto sperimentale. L'altra illustrazione 
mostra l'equazione di parola per la reazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μαγνήσιο που 
αντιδρά με τον ατμό. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει 
πειραματική οργάνωση. Η άλλη απεικόνιση εμφανίζει εξίσωση 
λέξης για την αντίδραση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran el 
magnesio que reacciona con vapor. Esta ilustración muestra la 
disposición experimental. La otra ilustración muestra la 
ecuación de la palabra para la reacción.</string>
          </description>
